entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
